metadata.name: The Golden Soul
metadata.description:
Her skin and her soul, bright and yellow as gold.
Her penetrating eyes are like the touch of Midas.
Look at her with attention and you could become golden too.
 
~

Artwork inspired by Woman #8426 from the collection World of Women (by Yam Karkai). The derivative art piece was minted with the permission of the owner of the original WoW.
 
~

Created in Procreate.
